worklogs.comment:
tianchen92 commented on pull request #5781: ARROW-6594: [Java] Support logical type encodings from Avro
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5781
 
 
   Related to [ARROW-6594](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6594).
   
   Avro supports some logical types that overlap with Arrow logical types (http://avro.apache.org/docs/current/spec.html#Logical+Types)
   
   For the ones that overlap, we should use the appropriate Arrow Logical type array instead of the raw values.

fields.description:
Avro supports some logical types that overlap with Arrow logical types ([http://avro.apache.org/docs/current/spec.html#Logical+Types) |http://avro.apache.org/docs/current/spec.html#Logical+Types]

 

For the ones that overlap, we should use the appropriate Arrow Logical type array instead of the raw values.

 

it potentially makes sense to break this down further into sub-tasks for each logical type.
fields.summary: [Java] Support logical type encodings from Avro

comments.body: [~emkornfield@gmail.com] Avro also has logical type uuid and duration which not overlap with Arrow type, should we also support them with {{ExtensionTypeVector}}?
I don't think this is critical we should see if anyone asks for this.
